h1: How Many Calories in Cheese Slices?
assumptions: Cheddar cheese, 1 slice (28 g), full-fat, pasteurized.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cheese type, brand, fat content, and slice thickness. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of cheddar cheese provides about 113 kcal and 7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one cheese slice?
faqs.a: About 113 kcal for a standard 28 g cheddar slice.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in cheese slices?
faqs.a: Typically 9.3 g total fat per slice, with 5.3 g saturated.

faqs.q: Are cheese slices high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 183 mg sodium per cheddar slice.

faqs.q: How many calories in low-fat cheese slices?
faqs.a: Reduced-fat versions have about 68 kcal per slice.
